content:
TITLE: Configuring SonnetJS Routes
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to define routes using the SonnetJS router, including layout and child routes configuration. Shows setup of browser history and router instance creation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/packages/sonnet-router/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
// src/routes.ts
import { router, createBrowserHistory, createRouter } from '@sonnetjs/router';

export const routes = router()
  .layout(async () => (await import('./partials/Layout')).default())
  .children([
    router()
      .path('/')
      .component(async () => (await import('./pages/Home')).default())
      .get(),
    router()
      .path('/about')
      .component(async () => (await import('./pages/About')).default())
      .get(),
    router()
      .path('/contact')
      .component(async () => (await import('./pages/Contact')).default())
      .get(),
  ])
  .get();

const history = createBrowserHistory();

export const routers = createRouter()
  .routes(routes)
  .history(history)
  .mountedId('#app-1')
  .get();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing SonnetJS Application with Router
DESCRIPTION: Shows how to initialize a SonnetJS application with the configured router, including app creation, router integration, and mounting to DOM.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/packages/sonnet-router/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
// src/main.ts
import App from './App';
import { routers } from './routes';

import { createApp } from '@sonnetjs/core';

const app = createApp();
app.root(App);
app.use(routers);
app.lazy();
app.mount('#app');
app.initialized();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a New SonnetJS Project
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a new SonnetJS project using npx. This initializes a new project with the latest version of the create-sonnet-app package.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx create-sonnet-app@latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting the Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for the SonnetJS application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/packages/sonnet-store/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting SonnetJS Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the development server for the SonnetJS project, allowing for local testing and development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing SonnetJS Router Package
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the SonnetJS router package via npm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/packages/sonnet-router/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @sonnetjs/router
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing SonnetJS Store Package
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the sonnetjs/store package using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/packages/sonnet-store/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @sonnetjs/store
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing SonnetJS Core Package from NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the core package of SonnetJS from NPM. This package provides the foundation for building web applications with SonnetJS.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @sonnetjs/core
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies for SonnetJS Project
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all necessary dependencies for the SonnetJS project using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Project Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the project dependencies using npm.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/packages/sonnet-store/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating a New SonnetJS Project with NPX
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a new SonnetJS project using the create-sonnet-app package.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/packages/sonnet-store/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx create-sonnet-app@latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Changing Directory to New SonnetJS Project
DESCRIPTION: Command to navigate into the newly created SonnetJS project directory. Replace [my-sonnet-app] with the actual project name.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd [my-sonnet-app]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Navigating to Project Directory
DESCRIPTION: Command to change directory to the newly created SonnetJS project folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/sonnetjs/sonnet/blob/main/packages/sonnet-store/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd [my-sonnet-app]
```
